name: SillyCorn
description:
As a weird Corn you gotta get on the top of the fridge, but beware, the owner's hand is hunting you!

We bring you a game that is so ridiculously sweet and funny it's illegal. It's our team's project we worked on for last 4 months and we learned so much during the production. 

Programming: Valera Kuznetsov

Graphics: Kuba Babec

Design: Edyta Janicka
